column1: norman e. boyer| norman e. boyer age 91 of evening shade died saturday
column3: 2015 at an ash flat nursing home. he was born december 7
column5: missouri to edward and vesta (bowman) boyer. he was a retired railroad worker and a member of the piney fork church of christ at evening shade. he was preceded in death by his parents and one brother
column6: edward waldo boyer. survivors include his wife
column7: elizabeth boyer of the home; one son
column8: russell boyer of oregon; one daughter
column9: roberta boyer of evening shade; three stepsons
column11: robert williams of texas and jeff williams of evening shade; three step-grandchildren; three step great grandchildren; several nieces and nephews and a host of other relatives and friends. funeral services will be wednesday
column13: 2015 at 2:00 p. m. at the qualls funeral home chapel in cave city with bro. phillip lewallen officiating. burial will follow in the barnes cemetery located at evening shade with arrangements by qualls funeral home of cave city. visitation will be tuesday
column15: 2015 from 6:00 until 8:00 p. m. at the funeral home.
